title: Sans Humanist
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414103206im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_4130.jpg)

Can anyone identify this one?  
Thank you!

Font: 

 Akkurat Mono 

Solved By: 

 [Birdseeding](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414103206/http:/typophile.com/user/88704 "View user profile.")
author: J VILAS BOAS

comments.content:
Hard to tell from only four letters, but Dejavu Pro is a possibility:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dutchfonts/df-dejavu-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414103206/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dutchfonts/df-dejavu-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dutchfonts/df-dejavu-pro/")
The ear on the g is not right for Dejsvu Pro,

Well, I'm not sure about Dejavu Pro.  
Here's another shot!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414103206im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_3800.jpg)

There does appear to be more of a upward curve to the spur on the sample.

If you have a better suggestion, by all means....
I think this Akkurat from Lineto

Sorry, Joel, still no match.

Can you tell me if the sample is from a printed piece or a web site (if the latter, can you share the URL)? Do you know the year of publication? The country? All those details can help narrow down the search.

A sample of more than six letters would also be helpful, if it's available.

Les, Akkurat looks right for "page" and "b", but the 1 doesn't match (not even the one in Akkurat Mon0):

[http://lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414103206/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/ "http://lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/")
Akkurat is close but not it.
The "l" from Akkurat mono does, though.

Birdseeding, you are absolutely right. Les, I think you nailed this one (the sample is Akkurat Mono, despite what the dialogue box says):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414103206im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Akkurat_5260.jpg)

Akkurat Mono is the answer!  
Thanks a lot for your help! You rock!
Mono it is - good eye Johan,
